item.title: CSCO
item.description: score:47 Chances: The outlook for CSCO stock depends on trends for cloud computing, plus corporate and telecom networks amid the shift to remote work. New corporate products and services could boost Zoom stock but Microsoft looms. The Nasdaq index, largely comprised of technology stocks, has enjoyed a blistering run in 2023, which could positively impact CSCO stock.
